name: Starship Standoff
description:
Use W/A/S/D to move, space to shoot, Esc to pause. You can only take one shot per level, so make it count.

Art and Sound FX from www.kenney.nl

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Hitman" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
